channel.title: Did the Axoloti upgrade ever happen?
channel.description:
A while back (several years now), I made a post regarding an Axoloti upgrade.
To my memory, I did get a few replies mentioning that there was the possibility of a new, more powerful board coming out, so my question is.....did this ever happen or have people moved on to something else?
I see that there's nothing for sale on the main site, which half answers my question but perhaps there are still things in the pipeline.....anyone know?

item.title: Did the Axoloti upgrade ever happen?
item.dc:creator: @xoanxil xoanxil
item.description:
@xoanxil wrote:

Molec:

question

There were another attemp with Akso:

https://zrna.org/akso

But I am afraid it had the same fortunes that original Axoloti and now it is stopped.

Read full topic
item.source: Did the Axoloti upgrade ever happen?
